cannabis.title: Cannabis Cultivation & Inventory
cannabis.description: Desktop application designed to streamline and centralize the management of cannabis production. It allows growers to monitor individual plant health, track progress through all growth stages, and manage inventory with precision. Each plant is assigned a unique QR code, making it easy to identify and update records quickly. The app also supports bulk importing plant data from Excel files, which simplifies onboarding large batches and reduces manual entry. With features tailored for cultivation workflows—like batch tracking, status updates, and health notes—the app ensures cultivators stay organized, efficient, and compliant throughout the entire grow cycle.

features.track: Track plant stages, health, and lifecycle
features.qrScan: QR code assignment & scanning for each plant
features.manageBatches: Manage cultivation batches and inventory flow
features.attachNotes: Attach notes and set status updates for each unit

tradeplanner.title: Trading Journal & Planner
tradeplanner.description: A desktop application built to help traders plan, log, and reflect on their trades more effectively. Users can record detailed entries for each trade, including strategy notes, outcomes, and performance metrics. The app also features a dashboard that visualizes trading results over time, helping users analyze patterns and make more informed decisions.

tech.charts: for rendering interactive charts and analytics

features.logTrades: Log trades with strategy, entry/exit points, and personal notes
features.planTrades: Plan future trades and review pending setups
features.dashboard: Dashboard with charts to track performance, win rate, and equity growth
features.filterSearch: Filter and search trades by date, strategy, or result
features.cleanUI: Clean UI for quick review and easy navigation

portfolio.title: Developer Portfolio
portfolio.description: A clean and responsive personal portfolio built with Next.js to showcase my development work, skills, and experience. It includes dedicated pages for projects, a downloadable resume, contact options, and smooth animations for an engaging user experience. Designed to be both fast and accessible, the site reflects my attention to detail and focus on modern web development best practices.

tech.tailwind: for modern and responsive UI design
tech.sendgrid: handles email delivery from the contact form
tech.recaptcha: protects the contact form from spam

features.landing: Interactive and minimal landing page with call-to-actions
features.projects: Project showcase with image galleries and dedicated detail pages
features.resume: Built-in PDF resume viewer and bilingual (EN/FR) support
features.contact: Dynamic contact popup with Google reCAPTCHA protection
features.animations: Smooth animations and mobile-first responsive design

calculator.title: Smart Calculator
calculator.description: This Smart Calculator is a desktop replica of the iPhone calculator, enhanced with a few extra functions like square root and factorial. It keeps the same clean, familiar look for easy everyday use.

features.design: Simple and familiar iPhone calculator design
features.basicOps: Basic math operations: addition, subtraction, multiplication, division
features.extraFuncs: Extra functions: square root, factorial, etc.
features.focus: No scientific mode or history — focused on quick calculations
